forgot_password.title: Forgot Password
forgot_password.desc: Try to press and hold the 'Reset' button for 10 seconds, then release. You will see the LED lights blink. Wait for the router to reboot and then start again.
forgot_password.screen_check_admin_password_tips: Please check the admin password on the device screen. If you forget the password, follow the steps below.

login.retry_after: Too many failed login attempts, please try again in $$$$ seconds.
